snippet.title: Micron Trailer HD
snippet.description:
Micron is a unique fusion of puzzle and rhythm gameplay. Place pieces on the board to deflect bullets of energy that fire to the beat. Guide the bullets to the exit through 51 challenging levels — and 12 bonus levels — featuring a variety of distinctive soundscapes. Your solutions create the music.

Micron is available on Steam, iOS, and Android.

Steam: http://store.steampowered.com/app/290380
App Store: http://itunes.apple.com/us/app/micron/id532916819
Google Play: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.apparitiongames.micron

Official site: http://microngame.com
